column5: The Sugar Shack is close to family-friendly activities, nightlife, restaurants, Texas A&M, Washington on the Brazos, nature. Our place is conveniently located in the charming town of Navasota with antique shopping and only 20 minutes to Texas A&M. The Sugar Shack is good for couples, business travelers, families (with kids) and large groups.
column8: Sugar Shack Close to Texas A&M
